mapper.select: SELECT p.userreview, p.userreviewimg, 'sell' AS reviewType FROM post p WHERE p.userkey = #{userkey} AND p.userreview IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT p.dealuserreview, p.dealuserreviewimg,'buy' AS reviewType FROM post p WHERE p.dealuserkey = #{userkey} AND p.dealuserreview IS NOT NULL

SELECT p.dealuserreview, p.dealuserreviewimg, u.nickname, u.imgurl, t.city, t.district, t.`name`, 'buying' AS reviewType FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.dealuserkey = u.userkey JOIN address a ON u.userkey = a.userkey JOIN town t ON a.townkey = t.townkey WHERE p.userkey = #{userkey};
